org.melior.client.mongo

Class MongoClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.melior.client.core.ClientConfig
      • org.melior.client.mongo.MongoClientConfig
        • org.melior.client.mongo.MongoClient

  • public class MongoClient
extends MongoClientConfig
    Implements an easy to use, auto-configuring MongoDB client with connection pooling, automatic object mapping and support for storing managed items in the MongoDB collections.

    The client writes timing details to the logs while dispatching MongoDB messages to the MongoDB server. The client automatically converts any exception that occurs during communication with the MongoDB server into a standard RemotingException.

    Since:
    2.3
    Author:
    Melior
